ing: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen peas, thawed and drained
des: "A family favorite for years! Simple, but easy to change to suit your tastes. A favorite substitution is bacon for the ham!"
ins: Mix peas, ham, Cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, onion, and Dijon mustard in a large bowl. Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
